statement.p: This is an exploration.exploration Other similar possibilities are projectproject, activityactivity, tasktask, and investigationinvestigation.

Note that projects, activities, explorations, tasks and investigations share the independent numbering scheme, so it is really only intended you use one of these. If you want a variant of the name ( Directed Activity) you can use the renamerename an environment facility ().

solution.p: This is a solution to the exploration. In practice, you might choose to not make this visible for students, but instead include it as part of some guidance you might provide to instructors ( an Instructor's Manual).
